text: yūtarkaḷ kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; 'kiṟistavarkaḷ enta nalvaḻiyilum illai' eṉṟu. Kiṟistavarkaḷ kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; 'yūtarkaḷ enta nalvaḻiyilum illai' eṉṟu. Āṉāl, ivarkaḷ (taṅkaḷukkuriya) vētattai ōtikkoṇṭē (ippaṭik kūṟukiṟārkaḷ) ivarkaḷ kūṟum coṟkaḷaip pōlavē oṉṟum aṟiyātavarkaḷum kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; iṟutittīrppu nāḷil allāh ivarkaḷ tarkkittu māṟupaṭṭuk koṇṭirukkum viṣayattil tīrppaḷippāṉ
